name: "Crash of the Titans"  - "A New Hop" Quiz  | 10 Questions

questions.text: Cocoa is making an invention at the beginning of this game.  What is it supposed to recycle?
questions.explanation:
butter.

	Coco is working on a project that will be able to recycle butter.  Crash doesn't understand anything Coco says until she puts it in very simple terms. Coco: "Finally!  At last the world will have a way to recycle butter!"Crash: "Huh?"

questions.text: What, specifically, is the purple thingy?
questions.explanation:
Transvaluper.

	Coco asks Crash to hand her the transvaluper while making a device to recycle butter.  Crash doesn't know what to give her, even the only thing around him is the purple transvaluper in his hand, until she calls it a purple thingy.  Crash isn't the brightest fellow, and he doesn't say anything in most games.

Crunch.

	Crunch was a bad guy in a few previous games, but in this game he is on our side.  He is stuck in the ice from the very beginning, and doesn't escape for almost the whole game.

questions.text: Which of the following is something Crunch does not say if you whack him at the beginning of the level?
options: Hit Me Again!  I Dare Ya!  I Double Dare Ya!
Cover Your Mouth When You Sneeze!
Now You're Just Making Me Mad!
questions.explanation:
I'm Gonna Call Your Mother!.

	He never says he is going to call your mother.  He says several more things than just the three listed.  Also, don't bother to continuously whack him until he gives you mojo.  He never will.

questions.text: What is behind the first waterfall in this level?
questions.explanation:
A tunnel.

	You can't get to the tunnel through the waterfall.  You will make it to the waterfall later in the level after crossing a few bridges.  The second waterfall doesn't have anything behind it.  It is just there.

questions.text: What is on the flag at the beginning of the level?
questions.explanation:
Pawprint.

	The pawprint on the flag is Crash's pawprint.  You can also see these pawprints in every loading screen.  There are many different colors of these prints, white and orange being the two most popular colors shown.

questions.text: What does Crash throw at the cage to save Aku Aku?
questions.explanation:
Coco's Invention.

	He throws Coco's invention to recycle butter.  It worked quite nicely for him, but Aku Aku landed far away.  The level is mostly you traveling through Wumpa Island to save Aku Aku.

questions.text: What is the first upgrade you get in this game?
questions.explanation:
Norris Roundhouse.

	Norris Roundhouse is the first upgrade in the game, and you get it at 10,000 mojo.  If you have collected all the mojo, you should get this before you even get halfway through the level.  You get slide duration and spin attack upgrades periodically throughout the game, and you never have to earn grind.  It is something you will need to learn in later levels.

questions.text: How many bars are on Aku Aku's cage?
questions.explanation:
Thirty-six.

	You finally make it to Aku Aku's cage near the end of the level.  There are some Ratnicians there you will need to fight right before your first jackable creature.  The cage has 6 sides, with 6 bars on each side, including top and bottom, for a total of 36 bars.

questions.text: How many wobbly bridge pieces must you cross in total in this level?
questions.explanation:
Sixteen.

	Bridge pieces usually have faces all over them.  Also, if you walk back and forth on a bridge piece, you can collect the far away mojo otherwise unattainable.  The first of two bridges has a total of six bridge pieces, and the second bridge, which is a lot longer, has ten.
